case.state: Surprisingly not! I am glad to see you both!
Good to see you too, friend!
Fina! You're back too!
Seems we both liked the game a lot last time. I am glad you're back!
What are you doing so far from Beacon? Sorry if that was rude.
Salutations!
I am looking forward to getting to know you all!
It is a pleasure to meet you ~player~! My name is Penny!
This is very strange!
~rwby_franchise~! You're here too?
~rwby_franchise~! it is a pleasure to see you again!
~rwby_franchise~ it is good to see you again!
It is nice to see another synthetic person! I've never met one before.
Welcome friend! <i> (Well not a friend yet, but I think we can be!)
It is a pleasure to meet you!
I am glad to be playing with someone as pretty as you!
Don't worry! I like girls, but it is good to have a boy here too.
Yang! How have you been?
<i>(Yang is here... My chances of winning just went down.)<i>
This could be a lot of fun, but it does make me a little nervous.
This is not the table I expected, but I suppose I'm not complaining.
I have no problem with this table! Girls do look nicer than boys most of the time.
I guess I could be upset that I am not seeing anything I don't have, but this is so exciting!
We all like some of the same things then, or at least I hope so. Anyone who doesn't is in for a boring game.
This is the place, right? Yang said it was a good place to meet people and other things.
Salutations, everyone! My name is Penny! What are your names?
I am looking forward to getting to know you all!
I am looking forward to this game. I do hope if you're already here you do not mind why.
Could I have, um... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
Can I take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
Let's take, um ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
Only ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ for me please!
Thanks dealer! I'll only need ~cards.text~~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~
I suppose ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ will be enough.
I'll swap umm... all of them please.
I guess I can swap all of them. I'd like to do that please.
Five cards please, this could be great!
This probably is not good, but five cards please.
No cards for me thank you!
I only need... I don't need any cards.
Can I swap none of my cards?
I'll have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please!
Can I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
This is a good hand! I think.
Not losing this round!
Sorry, not my turn this time!
Yay!
It is sad someone always loses, but I guess they agreed.
I am sorry one of you lost.
Thank goodness. I'll be safe!
This is great! I won't get any more embarrassed.
I don't think I'll lose with this hand. <i>So someone else will lose.<i>
I'll play for a bit longer at least!
I should be happier about winning but losing doesn't seem so bad.
I am sorry one of you lost. *hic*
That's lucky!
I wonder if this is more luck or skill, it feels more like luck.
I am safe this round! <i> (How much would I really mind losing more though?)
I wonder which of you will end up stripping this round.
I'm willing to lose, but we'll see.
I wonder if all bars in Atlas are like this.
Good luck everyone!
I wonder how this game will go from here.
This hand should work, right?
I'm doing fine. *hic*
I wonder if I can win with these.
Win or lose, it has been fun.
I wonder why I got made with two arms with this upgrade as well. Was it just for my comfort or is it better somehow?
I hope that building I threw a Grimm into rebuilds okay. I didn't mean to hurt it.
I hope they keep that nice cleaning bot. It had a very cute meep.
This hand is good enough, I think.
I've got a great hand! *hic*
I'm fine to lose this round to help you all!
I don't think I'll win with this...
I think I'll lose this one.
Good job! I think I'm the loser this time.
This is not good.
This is okay. It could be worse.
I'm gonna be fine! *hic*
Good thing I'm not embarrassed about losing! *hic*
Oh no, I'm gonna lose this hand. Why do I feel like that isn't an all bad thing?
It does seem like people who play to win enjoy games less. Not that I play to lose... at least not on purpose anyway.
I wonder if there is a program to make me better at poker... and if I would want it.
This hand is not as good as I thought it was... I think.
I'll try one of whatever you like if you don't mind Sei!

state.text: Agh! This does not taste good to me, but thank you.

case.state: This is the place, right? Yang said it was a good place to get closer to people.
Pretty sure of this hand! *hic* <i> (It will be hard to bluff once they figure out I can't lie without the hiccups, maybe it can be turned off? I'll ask Dad.)
You're a ball. I can fly and shoot lasers and run around and hug people!

Mr Wheatley, I chose my human friends! One of them is my best friend! Please don't insult them! Or my dad! Or Winter or any of them! But I would be interested to meet other robots like me. It does get a little lonely sometimes.
Not falling over would be nice but it's not as good as being able to protect your friends. I could roll down a hill though. My aura would protect me!
I am a real girl! I live with humans because they are my friends okay? I'm not just a program!
Shut up! Shut up! You're wrong and you're a bully! I have an aura! No robot can generate an aura!
I shouldn't have shouted at you. I'm sorry, but they are my friends okay? And you could be too, if you stop being a... a jerk.
Don't worry Nagisa! I wouldn't let anyone be mean to you!
Why would it be gross if I thought about how everyone does it? Ohh no I understand now!
Umm, yeah, you were very hot and sexy and nice and stuff. I'm glad I got to see it.
Well it's nice to know I'm not missing too much!
Ohh I love sunsets too! I take it Yokohama's your hometown?
Shredding yourself still does not sound safe.
I could fly you around Atlas sometime if you wanted to! My other legs can fly.
Being able to fly is great! I would only trade it for my friends being safer!
I wonder if I should have been allowed to choose who I was, but I cannot ignore people in danger either!
I wonder if Winter or Ironwood would call you selfish. I can't call you that though.
Sorry for assuming Nagisa, I trust you.
I love green the best! But purple is really pretty on you, and sliver can be lovely too.
Are they famous rock stars like you?
If it would keep people safe, I guess I'd be willing to duel anyone! I already risk my life to keep others safe.
I'd love to! But I don't actually have any money, maybe I could talk to dad or Ironwood about it.
I wish I could play something! I could sing nicely I guess.
Why would you want to be good at it? They don't sound very friendly.
Good luck Meia. I will help if you need it.
I don't know if I'm that brave... or sure of myself. I want to be happy... to be loved by my friends, and love them. (Maybe more then one kind of love.)
I am going back to work. Ironwood said they had to increase the guard on the city because of this break.
I did not! You still look nice, though.
You really died and then came back?!
To make new friends! Or see old ones again! But now that your here, I can do both!
I'll happily race you, Emi! Though you might find me more of a challenge with my flying legs!
I'm happy to race you even if I don't lose! I love hanging out with friends!
I don't know, it's something I worry about too.
If you like them and they like you. Then I guess you're friends!
I guess I'm already a little bit famous in Mantle. I don't mind because it makes people happy to know I keep them safe! I don't know what I'd choose if I could choose.
I guess anything that makes people sad. It would be terrible to hurt someones feelings for a joke, after all!
What animal would you all most want to talk to?
I like your singing, Amy!
You sing well!
You have a beautiful singing voice Amy!
I don't need one either. I wonder why so many people wear them.
I like your gear! Did you pick it yourself or was it inspired by your captain?
Wow, you really are terrible.
It's not bad at all... but don't you want your own adventure?
Do you really want to be known as a heartless murderer? That sounds like the bandits I fight!
I like it! Fearsome but cuddly! Good for making people feel safe but scaring bad guys!
I do not think keeping them placated is a worry, unless they are a bad person.
I will help you search for them!
♪Yeah the Grimm aren't gonna win today... hey!♪ <i> GRRRRR!
What is everyone's favorite view? Mine is Mantle at night, so many pretty lights.
Are you... flirting?
I'd love to be your friend Jessie!
That makes sense, I can't imagine someone really serious doing it.
I could retie it for you if you wanted. I find dressing to be quite pleasant.
You should have told the truth from the start Hilda, that's unfair.
I would have been nice to you anyway! Don't trick people!
I guess I understand why you'd want to avoid stripping.
That doesn't seem very nice of you, but I guess you did tell us at least.
Why would it be bad for you to say they have pointy ears? I also find them cute.
That sounds very painful for you!
Like this?!
Ironwood says a good solider always gets the job done. I guess it's the same for you.
A good fighter always keeps people safe!
I've never really been asked that before... I'd like a massage? I don't need one but it might feel nice. Maybe just a long hug.
I do not mind this. Girls can be good looking to.
More boys might be a bit more embarrassing though.
That's understandable. I hope you can get to fly someday.
I'm sorry if I hurt your feelings! You aren't a bad person! I... don't know what I think about this.
Ohhh, that sounds really pretty. I always love how the ocean looks.
"Drive in Tori" don't sound like the kind of people who could given me an an eating function. I am happy to go with you, though.
Why are you calling me "Cash Money", is it because I was expensive to make?
How does growling make you more metal? I am all metal and I don't growl, and you don't seem to have any metal.
So you can eat mist if you live as a hermit for long enough? That does not make very much sense to me.
I guess I can be more then my title, even if I like it. How do you try to be more than yours?
That does sound lovely! I should do that for my friends the next time I see them.
I am happy to listen to whatever you want to talk about Fina!
The more of the same number and color the better your chance of winning. There are other fancy rules to, but they don't really matter. It's mostly about being lucky.
It's already nice just being here with someone like you! Thank you for asking though.
Hello, I am Penny Cashmoney... I suppose it does work... I wouldn't change my last name, though.
I would love to do that, Ignatz!
What would you want me to wear... would this be okay?
It's odd for me as well. I was made with this much hair on me. I can't grow more so I don't cut it. It feels like my head hair, but pricklier.
People do seem to not want to talk about sex stuff it's true. But I also don't want to talk about it sometimes.
I think I feel just like Fina does about that.
I have a new question... how do I stop thinking about it?
Oh that sounds much safer! I'd love to see you... shred, sometime then!
Oh, okay! That's the really loud songs, right? I think they are kind of cool, but they can be mean.
I am glad I didn't hurt your feelings. You have given me a lot to think about, too.
I guess that is easier when you choose it. I do love my job, it's just a lot to do all the time. It's nice always helping people, but if I ever fail...
Like this? This does feel a lot more fun to do!
I haven't dated a man, but they can be good fighters and leaders. Where I am from men and women have no problem working together.
I've mostly wanted to date girls, but I could think of a few men I might date. It would not be that different, I think.
Happy Birthday Meia! Did you come here to celebrate? We should!
Yes, it seems like it does.
That is so cool! You must be a great gardener to eat that well alone.
Oh uh, my hiccups are nothing to worry about. *hic*
I don't think it'll cure them... Hmm, I've never really thought about what I'm scared of before, apart from dying. What about you?
That sounds so pretty! Do you like it there?
I have never had anyone offer to paint me before, it sounds nice.
I have never thought about it before. I do not want it now but would I one day?
I live in the city of Atlas on Remnant, it's a lovely floating city in the snow! What is your home like?
I've never done anything like this before. I mean I've seen it but... not for real.
I have never been more intimate than this game with others. <i> (Maybe this game can change that.)
I would... also like to know the answer to that.
Yay for Ignatz!
That is fair because you started with quite a few layers I suppose.
Surely the crazier part of that story is that you where born wearing clothes.
That would be wrong of me. Everyone deserves protecting.
I can tell you it is as pretty up there as you think! Seeing the whole world like that is really special!
That does not sound fun; how fast were you going? I can go quite slowly if I need to.
You can't force everyone to surrender.
That's no secret, but how the heck is that an icebreaker!
♪ They see you as small and helpless, they see you as just a child. Surprised when they find out that a warrior will soon run wild!♪ <i> GRRRRRR!
Ohh, can an explorer guitar help you survive in new places? I do not know what a Paul would do though-is that one just a friend?
Yes that was fun! How do you get into doing stuff like that?
I'd really like a pet, maybe a cat or a snake, but they often seem scared of me.
I have not played well this game, but that's okay if you're all enjoying it!
I wouldn't expect anyone except Qrow to lose this badly.
I have never worn a swimming suit before, but I guess it would be simpler to swim naked after the game.
This does not seem like a very safe place to be playing games, but I can keep us safe.
I wonder if we can go for a swim after. I know I'm safe in water but I've never tried it.
The water here is so pretty! Where I come from it's all snow!
This is a bit of an odd place to play strip games, but if everyone wants to then I'm happy to!
I suppose I do not mind where we play as long as it's not too open.
I suppose a place to wash off is good after a game like this.
I have always wanted to take a shower or bath with someone close, but this seems a bit different.
I can see in near complete darkness, are the rest of you able to see properly?
The dark is a bit comforting I guess, but I wouldn't mind either way.
I don't like sand, it gets everywhere. I suppose a bit of time in it is fine though.
Are you all okay in the cold? It is a big worry whenever someone gets caught out in the tundra.
I do feel better about taking time off at night. The worst grim attacks are often in the day.
What a lovely little place!
I wonder if I could make myself a cabin like this in the tundra near Mantle. A nice little place where my friends could always go!
I was surprised when I learned all the places they play this game. I would have thought it was just here.
Can I have a glass of... milk, please.
Oh, this is such a pretty view!
The view reminds me of Mantle and Atlas at night.
That moon is very strange.
That's the moon?
Why would you play a game like this here? I know Ruby loves weapons, but I didn't realize people liked them that much.
Why did you want to play here, ~player~?
You're so unbothered by losing clothes it's... really hot.
I am glad to be spending time with you ~tsundere~ even if you are a bit rude.
It's okay to just like people and like the game ~tsundere~.
I really like your armor! It looks very carefully made!
Your armor looks good on you, ~armor~!
What is your military like, ~military~?
What is your military like ~military~? Mine is lovely!
Should you be in here, ~school_uniform~? That uniform makes you look like you are still in school.
That uniform is quite different from the military ones. <i>And not as good looking.<i>
~bounty_hunter~, do you ever wonder if all the people you bring in really deserve it?
What if you hurt someone who was trying to be nice, ~bounty_hunter~?
Hello ~shut_in~, what do you like to do with your time?
How are you feeling ~shut_in~?
You look so adorable!
I think you look cute at your height, ~short~!
Oh you look... really nice like that.
Why did you decide to get those tattoos, ~tattoo~?
I really like how you dressed up for this ~formal_attire~!
I do feel a little underdressed now.
There is no need to act like that ~gloomy~. This is a lovely game between friends or to make friends.
I can keep us safe if I need to, but I hope my day off is less violent.
This break is nice. Though I'm perfectly happy working alone most days. *hic*
I wonder if the other two kingdoms are as pretty as Atlas and Beacon.
Yang won with a hand like this... But Qrow lost with one... Hmm.
I honestly can't say how this will go.
It's funny that so many different people gather for this. I guess we all want to make friends!
I'm not sure if I'm remembering the rules right. It has been a while since I played any card games.
It's so nice to be here. No Grimm attacks or landslides, just some cards and some friends. <i> Hopefully. <i>
I'll miss the peace here. So I'll make sure to enjoy it now.
I'd like to dance with someone some day.
I've only played two or three card games before.
Regardless of who wins I'm glad to play with you all!
This is quite an interesting place, so much to take in.
This being my only worry is quite pleasant.
I have thought about playing games like this before...
I can taste food but I can't eat it. Does eating have it's own feeling? Do you like it?
Things can get intense even in a card game.
<i> (I wonder how this game might end if I learned to flirt better.)
Not much point covering up, I guess. I want to but I also... don't.
I do not really mind what you can see. I signed up for this and I'm enjoying it.
This game is quite exciting!
I do wish it would rain in Mantle sometimes. It was a big surprise seeing it for the first time in Beacon.
I wonder if I should have another outfit. I chose this one, but it does feel a bit strange having 7 sets of the same thing.
This deck is a little strange when you think about it. All the spades and hearts and stuff.
I didn't come here to win, or to lose, just to have a fun game.
I've enjoyed playing with you all so far!
I do know how to play, but it's not primary storage information... I am having trouble working out this hand.
I'll try that after my... strip. Don't want to hold the game up!
I came here to have night off from needing to use my lasers, they have nothing to do with my butt either.
I will be keeping on my skin layer sorry. Did you say machine gun nipples?
Thank you, It is nice to hear that from someone new. I do not think either of us are from earth though?
Ruby says I'm a real girl, and I try to listen to her, but I am a synthetic person, yes.
I can normally fly and control a lot of swords. I can shoot lasers and generate an aura, as well as all the things most people can do!
My dad made me! I'm one of the most human looking though, they don't bother with that for mechs.
I can normally fly and control a lot of swords. I can shoot lasers and generate an aura, as well as all the things normal people can do!
I'm sorry I don't know that place. I'm from Atlas. Is that a Mystral town?
I came here for the same reason as everyone else... to make friends! *hic* And to enjoy myself.
Thank you, I guess I did come here to enjoy myself. You seem like you come here a lot.
I don't think I was made with anything like that. Are your eyes feeling okay?
I don't have anything like... oh! My eyes are also stuck on you!
I'm the only one of me. I guess you could make more. I hope I have a soul, dad thinks I do.
I'd love to meet another person like me! I don't know him yet though.
I am not sure, but I hope nobody tries to. I keep a lot of people safe.
If you can only possess things that have a soul, maybe you should try it?
All bodies are objects really.
I am a bit new, but that does make it more exciting!
I suppose I have a few, most of the time Grimm threaten someone in the city or Tundra, and I go out and destroy them.
Sometimes I drive away bandits and pirates, it's not always possible to spare them all. Those fights tend to be much harder.
That sounds very cool! My dad made me in his lab though. How can you tell my insides are metal?
I am the official protector of Atlas and Mantle! I spend most my time flying around keeping people safe.

condition.saying: Are you fine with me watching so closely?

case.state: If you are okay with me doing the same. It is nice to be... appreciated by a pretty girl.
This game still has a long way to go!
This is making me a bit nervous? <i> But the nerves don't feel like normal?
This game is making me feel strange. I know how being... turned on feels normally but this is more.
I don't mind if you enjoy this.
It's nice knowing I can play this just like everyone else.
Don't worry! It's not all small stuff like this.
I can't really start with my corset, sorry.
We are going to strip fully, aren't we? That feels strange, to think about.
If anyone is frustrated by my next strip. I guess I can take that as a compliment.
I am happy to give up a round for you!
This seems fair.
Now that I've lost... it's someone else's turn after!
I guess it is the rules.
Well done everyone!
I can lose one, I guess.
My turn.
Are you all enjoying the game?
I'm happy to give up a round to keep you all happy!
Enjoy it, I guess.
Well done! You beat a very smart robot... More than just a robot but... nevermind.
Oh no. Don't worry. I will keep my word!
I guess it's my turn again.
The game is really starting up now isn't it.
I am glad that you are enjoying me losing.
It'll be your turn next!
This is okay, I'm happy to play my part.
I shouldn't be losing this much really.
Uhh, I guess you're seeing... more of me then.
Let's go! I am not worried! *hic*
This is okay. I knew it would be this.. embarrassing. *hic*
Okay. I guess I'm closer to the forfeit then before.
Well, it is only a few people.
Y... umm, don't worry about me, Senko!
I am beautiful? You are very pretty yourself Senko!
I am a synthetic person but I guess I can still be beautiful like you!
There are things I want but...
However I wanted... I Would like that.
You're pretty too, Saki! When have you played before? Where else is a game like this played at all?
I guess if you are happy to show yourself off, I do not mind doing the same thing for you!
Do they have robots where you come from? My dad is a very smart scientist.
My dad isn't a god! He is very smart though... do gods just make people where you are from?
Komi, why are you looking so closely? Am I malfunctioning?

condition.saying: Don't make me do somethin' you'll regret. And don't think I'll regret it.
Hey, hey, hey! Did one of my threats finally sink in?
Hey, c'mon, put on a smile. I don't want to have to kill a pretty face like yours.

case.state: You are stupid as you are rude! You don't have a chance against me, and I'm not going to let you hurt anyone!
I wonder who I know that would want to see this... <i> (Who would I want to see me like this?)
I like the feeling of these gloves, but I'll take them off.
Ironwood had these gloves made for me when I asked. He is nice.
It's actually quite strange taking these off. Seeing me without these is as rare as seeing me naked.
I dressed simply at the last ball I attended. They didn't want people to know what I was. I wonder what I could go in now, ballgowns or dresses or suits?
I can fly with my other legs! It's weird being able to just... Take off a part of them.
I can just... remove these? My other stockings are actually part of my legs, and they can fly!
The pressure of this feels nice, but don't worry, I'll play fair!
I can't remember the last time I took this off, actually.
The Beacon trip was a really good time. I got to see so much of another kingdom and make friends.
This is actually a scanner so Dad can check up on me! But it's also my bow.
I think the bow is cute! But don't worry. Rules first.
I wonder if I am more complex internally then any normal person. You all do seem to have a lot of inside bits.
I'll follow the rules... even if it's... getting embarrassing.
This game is... making me heat up now.
I wish Winter would be a little less confusing about what she is actually feeling. She is still nice, though.
I don't think I've ever taken this off in front of someone.
I have a few of these shirts, but this is my favorite.
I found an old ruin outside of Mantle the other week. Some cute animals live there, and they aren't too scared of me anymore.
I guess you get to see all of me now...
Enjoy the view I guess...
I didn't imagine this is how I would... strip for someone for the first time, but I do not mind this version.
How did that start? <i> (I wonder if I could get my friends to play?)
I guess it does make more sense to play this with friends, but this might be more exciting because I don't know everyone.
Would that include your heart, Saki?... and your boots? <i> (Why are boots important?)
I feel like if you stole someone's heart you would kill them... They probably wouldn't care as much about their boots after that I guess.
I wish I could get that back.
This game is getting a lot more real, very fast.
Ahh! I'm naked! *deep breath* This is okay.
I knew this could happen. It's no big deal. *hic*
It is nice to be... enjoyed.
Thank you Senko! You really think so, don't you?
I am here to... enjoy the game, win or lose.
Well, I wouldn't mind if you lost.
Thank you, Senko, I would be happy to have someone as kind as you... tend to me.
Don't worry Senko! You're pretty human, too!
They are... you might see soon.
I'd be less interested in this game if they weren't, I am sure!
Robots can do a lot of different things, but I've never heard of flashlight nipples, are you okay?
It is not to follow me around. It is so he can check if I'm okay after a long day of fighting. But your dad sounds sweet.
I am sorry, Komi. I should have said. I am a synthetic person, not a real girl like you.
I am the official protector of Atlas and Mantle! What is it you do?
I would prefer not to be first, but I did come here to do this... I mean, came here ready to do this.
Good job everyone!
Let's keep playing!
This is fun!
Good luck to you all!
Let's see if you can get me out of anything else!
Let's keep going.
Good thing I'm not embarrassed! *hic*
This is... <I> exciting me? <i>
This game is even more exciting than I thought.
Next round begins right away, doesn't it?
Do you... like what you can see?
Respectfully, dealer, this is not fair!
This round I win!
I've never seen a boy for real... uh, you know.
Glad you're playing, ~name~!
This game is so interesting!
I guess I'm lucky it wasn't me.
This game is pretty fun.
I wonder why they decided to make me a girl in the end.
I am looking forward to where this goes.
Sucks to be you! <i> (Oh no, that sounded way ruder than I thought.)<i>
I think you look great! So I'm looking forward to you wearing less!
I like this game!
I hope you don't mind that I'll enjoy this.
Why did you wear that?
Glad you're playing ~name~.
This game is so interesting.
You seem to have taken your shirt off too.
I want to see this!
I can not stop you, but I hope you only hurt yourself! <i> (I hope nobody gets hurt though.)
Why are you shooting in here?!
Are you alright Komi? You haven't spoken yet and seem a bit scared.
I do not normally like pirates; they hurt innocent people. Are you like that?
You're very pretty!
Do you need to strip in that order?
It's nice not having to layer up in the snow, but it can be a cute look.
That's good of you!
You're not pretty you're... sorry I mean, you are pretty! But you're more than that.
I'm not used to doing this, or seeing it in person. But I think I like it even better!
Heck yes!
Do you enjoy this like I do?
Sucks to be you! <i> (Oh no, that sounded way ruder than I thought.)<i>
I think you look great! So I'm looking forward to you wearing less!
I like this game!
I hope you don't mind that I'll enjoy this.
Why did you wear that?
Wow, that's super rare isn't it?
I didn't know that could even happen.
Where did they come from? Is that allowed?
Be more careful please, people could get hurt.
You're going to run out of those!
That's a good choice.
I respect that!
I thank you for coming and more for losing!
That's okay. I'm happy to make friends!
